title: Chevron Moves Ahead With $2 Billion Expansion at Gorgon LNG
description: Chevron and its partners in the Gorgon LNG facility offshore Australia have approved a $2-billion expansion project that would involve drilling six new wells and connecting new reserves to existing infrastructure. Chevron said in a statement today that the ex…
